module.name: LazVersion
module.short: Contains constants which identify the version numbers for the Lazarus IDE installed on the local system

descr.p: Values in the unit are used as the basis for corresponding LCL version numbers in the lclversion.pas unit.

element.name: laz_major
element.short: Major version number for the Lazarus IDE
element.descr: For the Lazarus version number 2.1.0.42, the value in laz_major is 2.
element.version: Added in revision 57504, and available since Lazarus 1.8.4.0.

element.name: laz_minor
element.short: Minor version number for the Lazarus IDE
element.descr: For the Lazarus version number 2.1.0.42, the value in laz_minor is 1.
element.version: Added in revision 57504, and available since Lazarus 1.8.4.0.

element.name: laz_release
element.short: Release number for the Lazarus IDE
element.descr: For the Lazarus version number 2.1.0.42, the value in laz_release is 0.
element.version: Added in revision 57504, and available since Lazarus 1.8.4.0.

element.name: laz_patch
element.short: Patch level for the Lazarus IDE
element.descr: For the Lazarus version number 2.1.0.42, the value in laz_patch is 42.
element.version: Added in revision 57504, and available since Lazarus 1.8.4.0.

element.name: laz_fullversion
element.short: Numeric version number for the Lazarus IDE
element.descr: For the Lazarus version number 2.1.0.42, the value in laz_fullversion is 2010042.
element.version: Added in revision 57504, and available since Lazarus 1.8.4.0.

element.name: laz_version
element.short: String with the full version number for the Lazarus IDE
element.descr: For the Lazarus version number 2.1.0.42, the value in laz_version is '2.1.0.42'.
element.version: Added in revision 57504, and available since Lazarus 1.8.4.0.
